articles.content: SJVN Share Price: SJVN shares hit a lower circuit of 19.99 per cent on BSE on Monday (February 12, 2024) after the hydroelectric power generation and transmission firm reported weak December quarter … [+1100 chars]

articles.title: Bandhan Bank shares drop 4% after analysts lower EPS estimate, target price - CNBCTV18
articles.description: JPMorgan has cut the target price on Bandhan Bank shares to ₹270 per share from ₹320 per share earlier, implying a potential upside of 25% as against 48% projected earlier.
